show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Health Impacts
content:
On today’s Connect the Dots, health, food, and environmental journalist, and Ctdots host Alison Rose Levy, whose blogs… appear on the Huffington Post and Alternet, speaks with public health physician and policy expert, David O.
Carpenter, MD Carpenter is the Director of the Institute for Health and the Environment University at Albany, and he is also directing the new initiative, Health Care Professionals of New York www.healthprofessionalsny.
com which welcomes NY health professionals and advocates to join forces to assure that the real health impacts of fracking are assessed and prevented.
For more information, please go to their website and follow Alison @Cxtdots
